title: Bug 109718: Large content in text item causes tips to display in one line
description: INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item. Expected Result: Tips show in given format. Actual Result: Tips show in one line.
OB: When saving and putting the mouse on the text item, the tips are displayed in one line.
EB: The tips should be displayed in the given format instead of being displayed in one line.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the text item.
3. Put a large content in the text item.
4. Save the text item.
5. Put the mouse on the text item.
Expected: The tips should be displayed in the given format.
Actual: The tips are displayed in one line.
